# Coerce object to an object of the class SpatialLines

```r
as.spatialLines(x)

## S4 method for signature 'GPRsurvey'
as.spatialLines(x)

## S4 method for signature 'GPR'
as.spatialLines(x)
```

## Arguments

- `x`: (`class GPR|GPRsurvey`)

## Returns

(`SpatialLines object`)

Coerce object to an object of the class SpatialLines
